name: Chewing bounce (SillyDeveloper)
description:
Left click down to set start of gummy, this should be put in screws

Left click up to set end, you should put in screws too

Space to throw a ball

R to reset level

T to go to level select

You can do a lot of throws to get the stars for then throw the ball into the bucket, but if you use a lot of gumchew it would be imposible to make a good throw

SFX reference: Freesound<3

  • zagi2-cartoon groove.wav (Melodia)
  • Theriavirra-Share_with_no_spring.wav (Click)
  • hecholio-11 Toing Flecha.wav (Rebote)
  • Mr._Fritz_-Item Sparkle (Estrella)

Any other assets was made by me
